abstract: Ezra F Vogel has written Deng Xiaoping and the Transformation of China, biography of Mao’s vice premier, who set China on its path of reform but also authorized the use of force in Tiananmen Square in 1989 .
snippet: Ezra F. Vogel has written a major biography of Deng Xiaoping, Mao’s vice premier, who set China on its path of reform, but also authorized the use of force in Tiananmen Square in 1989.
lead_paragraph: Ezra F. Vogel has written a major biography of Deng Xiaoping, Mao’s vice premier, who set China on its path of reform, but also authorized the use of force in Tiananmen Square in 1989.

headline.main: The Man Who Took Modernity to China
headline.print_headline: The Man Who Took Modernity To China
headline.seo: The Impact of Deng Xiaoping, Beyond Tiananmen Square
